function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential multicollinearity in MLR analysis","Impact":"Inaccurate prediction and unreliable variable coefficients","Mitigation":"Conduct multicollinearity diagnostics and consider alternative modeling methods","Technologies":"Statistical software with multicollinearity diagnostics tools","People":"Data analysts, statisticians","Owner":"Data analysis team and researchers"},{"Description":"Contagious disease spread due to spatial plots for case studies","Impact":"Potential dissemination of disease through shared spaces and gatherings","Mitigation":"Implement virtual case studies and limit in-person data collection and analysis","Technologies":"Virtual reality platforms, video conferencing tools","People":"Research participants, data collectors, researchers","Owner":"Research team and ethics committee"},{"Description":"Inadequate consideration of public health impact in mobility simulation for activity data","Impact":"Risk of overlooking disease transmission pathways and hotspots","Mitigation":"Incorporate public health data and consultation with epidemiologists","Technologies":"Public health databases, epidemiological modeling software","People":"Public health experts, epidemiologists","Owner":"Research team and public health authorities"}]}
